description.value:
You pointedly note your enemy's deficiencies, filling them with fear and dismay. Strike an opponent with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Aldori Dueling Sword].

If the Strike is successful, attempt a @Check[dueling-lore|against:will|options:inflicts:frightened|traits:emotion,fear,mental]{Dueling Lore} check against the target's Will DC. On a success, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}. This is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.
